alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Clinton, northwestern Lamoille, northeastern Grand Isle, northeastern Chittenden and Franklin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Alburgh Village to St. Albans City to near Milton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enosburg Falls, Franklin, Alburgh Village, Westford, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Sheldon, Georgia, Enosburg, Swanton, St. Albans Town, Alburgh, Enosburg Falls Village, Milton, Swanton Village, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Berkshire, Highgate Falls, and Lake Carmi State Park. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 98 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
